    • Method Detail

      • computeETag

        public static String computeETag(byte[] response,
                 HandlerContext context)

        Computes a MD5 hash of the provided response. This hash is used as an ETag value.

        The ETag is wrapped with " as suggested in the RFC 2616, section 14.19.

        Parameters:
        response - The response from which the ETag is computed.
        context - The context in which the ETag must be computed.
        Returns:
        a MD5 hash of the provided response, used as an ETag.
